name: impregnable
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
A building or other place that is impregnable is so strongly built and/or defended that it cannot be entered by force: Despite burglar alarms and window locks, homes are never impregnable against determined thieves.
mainly UK powerful and impossible to beat, especially in sport: impregnable lead Surrey have been building up an impregnable lead in this season's County Championship.
